passage.title: How many legs?
passage.paragraph: How many legs do you have "Two, of course." You may answer if you are healthy.
What about animals? Do all animals have two legs? How many legs do the animals have? There are many answers.

Some animals have no legs, like snakes, fish and worm. Birds have two legs. Some mammals, like cats, dogs, tigers, bears, monkeys and elephants, have four legs. Some starfish have five legs. Insects have six legs. Spiders have eight legs. Crabs have ten legs. Centipedes have many legs.
